data.actual_result: In the first try you can't slide the server, in the second try it works
data.expected_result: You can slide the file normally like nothing has happened
data.short_description: You can't slide any server after canceling the upload of a dropped file
data.steps_to_repro: - Drag and drop any file into discord from an external window - Click in "Cancel" button - Now try to slide any server in the servers bar
